properties.areaDesc: Laguna Madre From 5 nm North Of Port Mansfield To Baffin Bay TX; Laguna Madre From the Port Of Brownsville to the Arroyo Colorado; Laguna Madre From The Arroyo Colorado To 5 NM North Of Port Mansfield TX; Coastal waters from Baffin Bay to Port Mansfield TX out 20 NM; Coastal waters from Port Mansfield TX to the Rio Grande River out 20 NM
properties.headline: Marine Weather Statement issued January 15 at 9:43PM CST by NWS Brownsville TX
properties.description:
Warm and humid onshore flow is expected to continue across cooler
waters, allowing marine fog to persist overnight. Coastal
webcams, satellite imagery, and local observations continue to
show patchy fog across the lower Texas coast. Marine visibility
will generally vary between 2 and 5 nautical miles, with dense
marine fog reducing visibility to 1 nautical mile or less at
times. A Dense Fog Advisory may be needed if visibilities remain
below 1 nautical mile for an extended period of time.

Mariners are advised to navigate with caution in nearshore areas
and in the vicinity of jetties and bridges, as visibilities may
change rapidly.

NWSheadline: MARINE FOG TONIGHT ACROSS COASTAL AND NEARSHORE WATERS
